A4.text: Founded in 1718 as a Spanish mission and colonial outpost

A5.text: German immigrants founded smaller surrounding towns such as New Braunfels, Castroville, Boerne, Comfort, Fredericksburg, and Bulverde, all towns far out from San Antonio.
